title: Poro-snax, how i miss you.

replies.body: this is a serious matter.  we need a red in here!
Hopefully one mosey's on by and can provide us with information about this devastating crisis.

If poro-snax are not returned, I WILL be contacting PETA. Starving poros is inhumane and we ***will not*** stand for it. Roit pl0x. Don't make us go to the authorities. Do the right thing and allow us to feed the poros.
huh maybe they will fix it ^.^

[I posted about this here](http://community.na.leagueoflegends.com/c/support/uetMoPIV-how-do-i-feed-the-poros-now) shortly after the patch was completed. I discovered this after logging on to Howling Abyss to try out the new culinary mastery, which I assumed would also provide me with Poro snacks for every health potion upgrade. Much to my (and the Poros) dismay, I found myself Poro snack-less, which is why I, too, felt compelled to voice my concern about this grave starving Poro situation. I am happy to see I am not alone in my outrage and I hope that soon others will join the movement to SAVE THE POROS!!!!!!
yes if we can't save the world at least save the poros
